about-me.headline: About me
about-me.about-me-text: I am a passionate Front-end Developer from Treuenbrietzen, Germany, who thrives in team environments. When something excites me—like developing and designing web applications—I dive in with unstoppable energy and dedication.Although I'm still at the beginning of my career, I am eager to learn and deeply grateful for every opportunity to grow. My reliability, loyalty, and ambition define me, while my empathy and team-oriented mindset help me collaborate effectively with others.If you're looking for a motivated developer who is always ready to take on new challenges, feel free to reach out!

portfolio.join-info: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
portfolio.sharkie-info: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poision bottles to fight against the killer whale.
portfolio.pokedex-info: Based on the PokeAPI a simple libary that provides and catalogues pokemon informations.

contact.error-text: Your email should look like this:

references-quotes.name: A.Albrecht
references-quotes.comment: Working with Florian was always communicative and solution-oriented. I could rely on him and appreciated his open and friendly manner. I look forward to future projects with him.

references-quotes.name: J.Natzschka
references-quotes.comment: Florian did an excellent job during our project work. His ability to translate complex logic into reliable code significantly advanced our project. Furthermore, I particularly appreciate his reliability and the pleasant collaboration with him.

references-quotes.name: M.Marrocu
references-quotes.comment: Florian is extremely creative and always finds solutions that push the team forward. His willingness to help sets him apart – he supports others at any time with advice and assistance. Through his strong commitment, he ensures that projects are successfully implemented.

projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.sharkie: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.
projects.pokedex: Based on the PokeAPI, a simple library that provides and catalogs Pokémon information.
projects.da-bubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

user-feedback.text-2: I will get back to you within a week at the latest.
